title: California Fires History
description: Historical data of wildfires in California, sourced from CAL FIRE
source: California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection (CAL FIRE)

active_fires.sql: SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE IsActive = 1 ORDER BY AcresBurned DESC
active_fires.title: Currently Active Fires

largest_fires.sql: SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY AcresBurned DESC LIMIT 10
largest_fires.title: 10 Largest Fires by Acreage

fires_by_county.sql: SELECT County, COUNT(*) as FireCount, SUM(AcresBurned) as TotalAcres FROM incidents GROUP BY County ORDER BY TotalAcres DESC
fires_by_county.title: Fires by County

recent_fires.sql: SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY Started DESC LIMIT 20
recent_fires.title: 20 Most Recent Fires

least_contained.sql: SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE IsActive = 1 ORDER BY PercentContained ASC LIMIT 10
least_contained.title: 10 Least Contained Active Fires
